comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This appears to be Frederick W. Sessions, milliner involved in many civic causes, b. 1857 , and lived in Utica, New York. Here is a 1920 profile in The Illulstrated Milliner (p. 172): books.google.com/books?id=atNOAAAAYAAJ&lpg=PA174&...

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: artolog:  Thanks for the additional information on Sessions.  We'll include some of it next time we update.
